page.title: 08UCKFIELD'S INDUSTRY 3.
page.content: The range of{products}and{services} proved to be as varied as the employment statistics.For example one company markets soil surveying instruments to many foreign countries including the whole of Africa.Another concern provides a repair and conversion service for automotive and marine intrumentation systems.At the {heavy engineering}end of the scale, two companies are providing road surfacing plant and steel girder sections. Other products and services in the estate included ,micro- electronic disco control systems, a kayak supplier,electronic data- control equipment, custom car parts, kitchen equipment,ready-mixed concrete and wire making equipment.
